lead_paragraph: Stewart scored 27 points and grabbed 13 rebounds against South Florida to help top-ranked Connecticut overcome its first halftime deficit in almost a year.

headline.main: Breanna Stewart Helps UConn Rally Back

snippet: Stewart scored 27 points and grabbed 13 rebounds against South Florida to help top-ranked Connecticut overcome its first halftime deficit in almost a year.
abstract: University of Connecticut women's basketball team defeats South Florida, 79-59; other college basketball scores noted.
